data.title: Truce Bakura by Tyers Kathy, First Edition
data.meta_description: The Truce at Bakura: Star Wars Legends by Tyers, Kathy and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Includes dust jacket. First Edition. Book in good condition, tight and square. Clean. Good reading copy. Some marking/ underlining, text and pictures are intact . Dj included. First Edition / First Printing as identified with "1" in the full number line.

First book edition. Bantam Books, 1994, 1st edition hardcover in dust jacket, US Star Wars science fiction novel, continues the adventures of the original characters Luke, Han and Leia from the first film, tie-in novel wth the Star Wars film series, nice copy, bright and firm, as new, book and jacket Fine. hardcover.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very good. First UK edition-first impression. VGC.Bantam Press, 1994. First UK edition-first impression. Blue hardback(gilt lettering to the spine, two small nicks on the edges of the cover and spine) with Dj(small creases and nicks on the edges of the Dj cover), both in VGC. Nice and clean pages with small ink mark, nick and slightly tainted on the outer edges, light shelf wear on the Dj cover. 311pp. Price un-clipped.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Drew Struzan (illustrator). First edition. First printing with full number line. Book Condition: Fine: A tight bright copy with a very faint spot of toning to the fore and bottom edges. / DJ Condition: Fine: A sharp bright dust jacket. Not price clipped. Mylar cover.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First edition. Fine in fine dustwrapper. Hardcover. Please Note: This book has been transferred to Between the Covers from another database and might not be described to our usual standards. Please inquire for more detailed condition information.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First edition. Near fine in very good dustwrapper. Bottom corners slightly bent. Shelf rubbing to dustwrapper. Please Note: This book has been transferred to Between the Covers from another database and might not be described to our usual standards. Please inquire for more detailed condition information.

paperback. Condition: Good/No Dj. 1st printing. Mass Market Pb 0553568728 Nice copy free of stamps or names. Expect usual signs of age and handling.

Audio Book (Cassette). Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. 1993. Audiobook. Fine. Two cassette tapes. Three hours running time. Read by Anthony Heald. Abridged. Books are packed and shipped in boxes. Audio Tape.
